00032 {
00033 
00035 public:
00036

00040

00043 
00044     operator ClassType* () const;

00047

00050

00053 
00055 public:
00056

00058     bool operator!= (ClassType* pkObject) const;

00060     bool operator!= (const SpReference& rkSpReference) const;
00061 
00063 protected:
00064 
00065     //: Pointer to the shared object

00069 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 
00071 #include "SpReference.inc"
00072 
00073 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 // Macro for Enabling SpReference Counting in Class Declaration
00075 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 
00077 #define EnableReferencing() \
00078 public: \
00079     void addSpReference () \
00080     { \
00081         m_uiSpReferences++; \
00082     } \
00083     \
00084     void removeSpReference () \
00085     { \
00086         if ( --m_uiSpReferences == 0 ) \
00087             delete this; \
00088     } \
00089     \
00090     unsigned int getSpReferenceCount () const \
00091     { \
00092         return m_uiSpReferences; \
00093     } \
00094     \
00095 private: \
00096     unsigned int m_uiSpReferences
00097

00099 
00100 #define SpReferenceCast(type,reference) ((type*)(void*)(reference))
